meanings.definition: A board or platform at the foot of a bed, used to support the feet.
meanings.sent1: I rested my tired feet on the footboards of the bed.
meanings.sent2: She sat on the edge of the bed, her feet comfortably placed on the footboards.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the footboards were a perfect spot for a nap.
meanings.sent4: The footboards of the bed were like loyal foot soldiers, always there to support.
meanings.sent5: The footboards creaked softly as she shifted her weight, a comforting sound.

meanings.definition: A board or step on a vehicle, such as a train or motorcycle, for passengers to rest their feet on.
meanings.sent1: The train conductor reminded passengers to keep their feet off the footboards.
meanings.sent2: He enjoyed the scenic train ride, his feet occasionally touching the footboards.
meanings.sent3: The motorcycle rider pretended the footboards were his dance floor.
meanings.sent4: As the train chugged along, the footboards seemed like a pathway to adventure.
meanings.sent5: The footboards of the motorcycle were a welcome relief after a long ride.
